search_result.link_content_summary:
{
"Summary": "Pilgrim's Pride and Gold Kist Announce Merger Agreement. Pilgrim's Pride Corporation (PPC) and Gold Kist Inc. (GKIS) today announced that the two companies have entered into a definitive merger agreement under which Pilgrim's Pride will acquire all of the outstanding shares of Gold Kist common stock for $21.00 per share in cash. The transaction, which was unanimously approved by the boards of directors of both Pilgrim's Pride and Gold Kist, has a total equity value of approximately $1.1 billion, plus the assumption of approximately $144 million of Gold Kist's debt.",
"Company Name": "Pilgrim’s Pride and Gold Kist",
"Email": "cameron.bruett@jbssa.com",
"Phone Number": "+1 970.506.7801",
"Address": "None",
"Product Information": "None",
"Representative": "Cameron Bruett",
"Useful Information": "Pilgrim's Pride is the second-largest chicken producer in the United States and Mexico and the largest chicken producer in Puerto Rico. \n\nGold Kist is the third largest chicken company in the United States, accounting for more than nine percent of chicken produced in the United States in 2005."
}

Useful info : Pilgrim's Pride is the second-largest chicken producer in the United States and Mexico and the largest chicken producer in Puerto Rico. 

Gold Kist is the third largest chicken company in the United States, accounting for more than nine percent of chicken produced in the United States in 2005.. Pilgrim's is committed to sustainability, animal welfare, and environmental stewardship.
